## Lesson Overview
**Content**: talking about a family of 4 with super powers to save the world. 

In this lesson, you are going to learn various words to describe super powers in English. You will also practice using these words in sentences.

## Example Sentences
1. The family has special powers to help people in need.    
2. The father is very brave and always protects his family.
3. The mother can become invisible to sneak past villains.
4. The son can control minds to stop bad guys from causing trouble.
5. The daughter is very intelligent and solves problems quickly.
